title: Need your genuine feedback India
selftext:
I'm 24 years old and preparing for UPSC. As for now I do nothing apart from a YouTube channel that I started a few months ago. Main sirf itna chahta hu ki aap thoda sa time nikaalkar mujhe mere video par feed de ske to achha hoga

Video achha nahi lge to aage mat dekhna don't worry... 

https://youtu.be/4oDr0UJ3vwA?si=QXMEGS0TKK1jEPlu

You can subscribe if you like it
comments: The youtubing has become a curse for indian youth. When they realize it is shortlived it will be too late
So youmean YouTube cannot be a career
